scripts.build:ios: react-native bundle --platform ios --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ios/AstudentApp/main.jsbundle --dev false --assets-dest ios
scripts.build:android: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest andro id/app/src/main/res
